--------------------------------------------------
PRINTING HUFFMAN TREE 
--------------------------------------------------

The Huffman Tree is: 
ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ: 413, DEFJKLMNVW: 169, JKLMVW: 80, LM: 39, M: 19, L: 20, JKVW: 41, JKV: 20, K: 10, JV: 10, J: 5, V: 5, W: 21, DEFN: 89, E: 42, DFN: 47, DF: 23, D: 11, F: 12, N: 24, ABCGHIOPQRSTUXYZ: 244, GPQRTUXYZ: 106, RT: 50, R: 25, T: 25, GPQUXYZ: 56, GP: 27, P: 13, G: 14, QUXYZ: 29, QXYZ: 14, QXZ: 6, Z: 3, QX: 3, Q: 1, X: 2, Y: 8, U: 15, ABCHIOS: 138, BCHI: 66, BI: 32, B: 16, I: 16, CH: 34, C: 17, H: 17, AOS: 72, S: 35, AO: 37, O: 18, A: 19

--------------------------------------------------
PRINTING LETTER CODES 
--------------------------------------------------

The codes for each letter are: 
M = 0000
L = 0001
K = 00100
J = 001010
V = 001011
W = 0011
E = 010
D = 01100
F = 01101
N = 0111
R = 1000
T = 1001
P = 10100
G = 10101
Z = 1011000
Q = 10110010
X = 10110011
Y = 101101
U = 10111
B = 11000
I = 11001
C = 11010
H = 11011
S = 1110
O = 11110
A = 11111

--------------------------------------------------
ENCODING SECTION 
--------------------------------------------------

The text to encode is: 
I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream.

The encoded text is: 
11001111011010100001011111000010110111110101111110110101000010111110000001101011111000100011110110101000010111110000011011111010001100111010010110101000010111110000


The text to encode is: 
If a dog chews shoes, whose shoes does he choose?

The encoded text is: 
1100101101111110110011110101011101011011010001111101110110111111001011100011110111111011100101110110111111001011100110011110010111011011010110101101111110111101110010


The text to encode is: 
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

The encoded text is: 
111110111111111010010100000101011111011001111110110100100010010101001110100111011010011001111011010100111110100011111001111111101101


The text to encode is: 
Birthdays are good for you. Studies show that people who have the most of them live the longest.

The encoded text is: 



The text to encode is: 
Cooler than the flip side of the pillow.

The encoded text is: 
110101111011110000101010001001110111111101111001110110100110100011100110100111011001011000101111001101100111011010101001100100010001111100011


The text to encode is: 
Does expecting the unexpected make the unexpected, expected?

The encoded text is: 
0110011110010111001010110011101000101101010011100101111010110011101101010111011101010110011101000101101010010100110000001111100100010100111011010101110111010101100111010001011010100101001100010101100111010001011010100101001100


The text to encode is: 
Shoot for the stars and you might land on the moon.

The encoded text is: 
111011011111101111010010110111110100010011101101011101001111111000111011111011101100101101111101011100001100110101110111001000111111011101100111100111100111011010000011110111100111


The text to encode is: 
Snap, crackle, pop.

The encoded text is: 
1110011111111101001101010001111111010001000001010101001111010100


--------------------------------------------------
ENCODING SECTION 
--------------------------------------------------

The text to decode is: 
01111100111010010100111110000001001010011011011111010111

The decoded text is: 
NICETOMEETYOU


The text to decode is: 
11011111111010010100101101110001100110001001110110110011111101101

The decoded text is: 
HAPPYBIRTHDAY


The text to decode is: 
0110011111100111111111010011000101111101010011011110000101110

The decoded text is: 
DATASTRUCTURES
